entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
